body: I have wondered before if actual proper support in the toolchain for tls variables would be a next reduction in headaches.  I think it would be OK if it was only supported for assembly files (or on the Prog/Addr level, which is more or less the same).  If you only permitted moves to/from registers to the TLS var it would be pretty easy to mangle that to the right code in progedit for all arches I think.
